page.title: CLF Export
page.description: Export cell data to CLF (Cell List File) format. These files can be used with cell monitoring applications to identify base stations serving your mobile phone.

info.appsTitle: Popular monitoring apps using CLF files:
info.iosNote: There is no such app for iOS/iPadOS/watchOS because Apple does not allow monitoring such things from within apps.

form.operatorsHint: Select one or more operators. If none selected, all operators will be exported.
form.standardHint: Optional, by default all standards are exported.
form.bandsHint: Optional, by default all bands are exported.

exportError: Failed to export CLF file. Please try again.
